verses.roman:
gaṅgā-tīra-pathe sukha jānāiha tāṅre
bhaṭṭācārya āsi' tabe kahila prabhure

synonyms: gaṅgā-tīra—on the bank of the Ganges; pathe—on the path; sukha—happiness; jānāiha—kindly let know; tāṅre—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhaṭṭācārya—Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya; āsi'-coming; tabe—thereafter; kahila prabhure—informed Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: "Tell the Lord of the happiness you will feel in traveling via the banks of the Ganges." Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya therefore submitted this prayer to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
